lenders.name: Amanda & Karen
lenders.loan_because: From each according to his ability, to each according to his need. We can't loan much, so we loan what we can. It's easy, and it's a great way to make a small difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I (Amanda) am an architect, with a focus on affordable housing in the Pacific Northwest. I want to build better buildings and better cities that will have the lasting ability to improve the quality of people's lives.

I (Karen) am a librarian. I love helping people get access to information. I'm also a gardener, and I'm currently really looking forward to our summer crop of tomatoes.

lenders.name: Naveed
lenders.loan_because: I am greatly  inspired by Muhammad Yunus . They call him the "banker of the poor." the Bangladeshi economist who pioneered a new category of banking known as micro-credit, which grants small loans to poor people who have no collateral and who do not qualify for conventional bank loans."No one is more motivated than the poor to get out of poverty"
lenders.occupational_info: In any situation the greatest good you can do is your best. I believe that when you know you are doing your best, regardless of what happens to you that is beyond your control, you will be able to retain a pervasive sense of inner peace. You can ask for nothing more than to be doing your very best at this particular moment in time. If you have that, you want for nothing. And if you want for nothing, the natural consequence is peace.

lenders.name: Mary-Anne
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy for me to make a difference to someone who really needs the help. And it is exciting.

There are over 900 items to choose from so there should be something for everyone. This is my favourite place, from order to delivery was only 4 day’s can’t get better.

Happy shopping

Steve

lenders.loan_because: i want people to have the same opportunities available to me

lenders.name: Social Justice Team
lenders.loan_because: We must use the gifts and talents we have been given to stand in solidarity with those on the margins of society.
lenders.occupational_info: The Social Justice Team seeks to discover, explore and embody our Christian call to radical, Christ-like love. We are rooted in the Scripture and our rich tradition of Catholic Social Teachings. We connect what we experience at Mass to how we live by serving the common good through works of mercy for the poor and vulnerable as well as working to eliminate the conditions that create the need for charity by advocating for just social policy and education of ourselves and the community.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to now
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 6 -7 year olds math, literacy, science, and social studies

lenders.name: Ellis

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become self-sufficient and be able to provide for their families. I love Jesus, and this is a way I can show His love to others.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the many men and women who see beyond the hard times and try to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers, machines and other technologies easier to use for everyday people.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have an opportunity and responsibility to end poverty in our lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur, writer, creator.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because:
Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better.  It's not.  ~Dr. Seuss

Nobody can do everything, but everyone can do something.  ~Author Unknown

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Giving to others is the greatest gift of our lives.  We receive so much more from giving than receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom of two boys.

lenders.name: Hoja
lenders.loan_because: I feel so connected to the world because when one goes through hardship, we all do. And if my small income and wealth can be shared and made useful to others. Particularly ones that share in turn with their communities... It makes me happier than anything else in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I read books and pass tests!
Hopefully it will lead to something bigger!
I am studying Journalism and hope to write and speak about Kiva to others.

lenders.loan_because: People everywhere deserve the opportunity to reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Robert

lenders.occupational_info: Working to help others.

lenders.name: People in the Coud
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the classic saying you can give a man a fish or you can teach him how to fish and feed him for life. Our business focuses on providing people living in third world countries the opportunities to work in virtual environments to sustain their livings.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an offshore recruitment agency. We hire employees in third world countries to work for clients in first world nations. This allows employees to earn above standard livings for their families, while providing cost cutting service for companies. Ultimately our goal is to provide a global community where workforce is not chosen on your location but the quality and skills of individual candidates.

lenders.name: Jilian
lenders.loan_because: I know that the people using these loans really appreciate the money they receive, and it's nice to be a part of that process.

lenders.name: Channing
lenders.loan_because: I may not have the most, but I sure don't have the least, and I don't want to take my opportunity to give for granted. Christ calls me to more.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans allow people an opportunity to realize their dreams of being an entrepreneur in a manner that preserves their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a connector and communicator.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to. I've received enough kindness in my 29 years of life from others. It's time I start giving some of it back.

lenders.name: Kinnion
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help now and then.

lenders.name: bcmegan

Chinese Proverb

lenders.occupational_info: I engineer telecommunication networks.

lenders.name: Erickson Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my kids the importance of giving to help others, and that there are people in the world who live differently than us in the western world.  We make a loan twice a month, and the kids choose the entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people invest their savings to provide for future needs.  I believe Kiva is a way to invest socially, with valuable social returns.

lenders.name: Diz
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged to have so much more than many others in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from working on a ferry that carried people and cars between towns  here in Alaska

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student in a French business school, and I am currently working in the gas industry, more precisely in marketing for the Welding and Cutting segment.

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: I want to run a selling perfumes business but now I don't have anything with me to start.I hope from this site I can get the loan for me to as my capital.I need $15500 for starting.
lenders.occupational_info: I will open a kiosk in KLCC. I choose the place because it's one of the busiest place in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.occupation: Work for the Town of Frisco
lenders.loan_because: With just a little money, I can help someone else with their business and change their lives for the better!
lenders.occupational_info: During a typical day I repair and maintain the streets within the town, whether it be plowing snow during the winter or patching the road, replacing signs and cleaning the streets in the summer.

lenders.name: nick
lenders.loan_because: i am a beast
lenders.occupational_info: cause i feel good for people who have good ideas

lenders.loan_because: I am tall and I need my rep up because i stomp on too many people
lenders.occupational_info: Hard to see people, easy to squish, though

lenders.name: Stinsons Students
lenders.loan_because: My students are actually the ones raising the money for this loan!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social studies high school teacher who strives to reveal to my students the excitement and satisfaction of making connections with people of other cultures throughout the world!

lenders.loan_because: We can

lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels
lenders.occupational_info: My job is all about giving a good meal experience for my clients and to make money from it

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: My students and I wanted to make a change.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: My sister found this wonderful organisation and I love the idea so much.  It seems a powerful way to enrich others while enriching ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Listening to doctors reports and typing them into legible format.  Helping students to learn this work.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: If I have the means to help anyone I will try my best.  Everyone should have some kind of opportunity to be successful in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work very hard as a caterer to make sure my customers are satisfied in everyway.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because:
The loans I give here are in memory of my late husband Bob Raymer, who died in November 2008 of Alzheimer's Disease. He was deeply loved by so many people because his main purpose in life was to be of service to others. I can't think of a better way to honor his memory than to help others help themselves.

Also, giving to others is a wonderful way for me to "give back" to everyone who has helped me, whether financially or in other ways, through the years.

It's such a small world, we have to help one another. One life lifted lifts all lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired, which means I am no longer in the workforce; however, I keep busy with my writing and photography hobbies along with keeping in touch with my family and friends.

lenders.name: J-Florin
lenders.loan_because: i like helping people

lenders.name: prashant
lenders.loan_because: I think en-powering people is the best way of service we can do as individuals.

lenders.name: Hanny en Rob
lenders.loan_because: Lots of friends gave us credit to do so for our wedding anniversary!

lenders.name: simon
lenders.loan_because: through loaning, i make it possible for somebody to overcome a financial hurdle that would have otherwise impeded their progression in whatever endeavour they set out to do
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small scale businessman dealing in general supplies to both governmental and non governmental organisations

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies tell their stories better.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I think networks and one to one contact are very powerful so if enough people get involved with this and invite all their friends and contacts this could really make a difference. Plus if you help just one person it's got to be worth it. These people generally have the kind of attitude that offers the developing world its best chance to improve health and quality of life for all who are not as fortunate as many of us in the developed world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial planner, I advise people on how to plan their personal finances to meet their  long term goals in life from retiring in comfort to protecting their partner in case something happens to them to helping their children get a good education.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sell their house themselves.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: each of us needs to give to others
lenders.occupational_info: I record the business transactions for my firms

lenders.name: J.A.D.E.
lenders.loan_because: We are a home schooling family and use Kiva to make a difference in the world and to teach our children the importance of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family that schools at home.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the entrepreneurial spirit is alive in all people. Expanding the opportunity for others to live self-directed and empowered lives is a mission of mine. Peer to peer lending, and the micro-finance systems behind it, will help millions of people improve their lives and provide opportunities for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a successful entrepreneur who would like to teach others how they can improve their businesses while creating a better world. I am available to be a mentor to those who are dedicated to skills building and are open to coaching. I passionately believe we live in an abundant world and it is our job to harness it safely and form global communities to share ideas and be a part of a new civilization; one that respects all forms of life and preserves our very existence as a species.

lenders.name: Humberto Ferreira
lenders.loan_because: I feel that we all live in the same planet and share the same fate
lenders.occupational_info: I try to spread fun and knowledge around...so I project and develop games for mobile platforms

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can and I am grateful for what I have
lenders.occupational_info: I help publish books about technology, especially about the internet and these help people understand how it can be used and made better.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that we who have to give, should.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a partnership with a wonderful couple who have gifts that they are willing to share with new entrepreneurs around the globe and I am thankful that I am along for the journey.

lenders.name: Candace

lenders.name: Chelcea
lenders.loan_because:
'cause Mr. when you're rattling on heaven's gate.
By then it is too late.
'cause Mr. when you get there,
They don't ask what you saved.
All they'll want to know Mr. is what you gave.  Ben Harper

lenders.name: Kit and Liz
lenders.loan_because: We are a fortunate couple wanting to give to people who are working to make better lives for themselves rather than waiting for bailouts or having a sense of entitlement.  Microfinance is an amazing process, and these people want to create their own luck - we want to help!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Kit sells wood flooring, while Liz is an oncology nurse.

lenders.occupational_info:
I work with mixed media, and stone. I create small scale (jewelry) and larger scale sculpture works in metal as well as modeling compounds and I paint.
 My ability to work is limited , so I love to encourage others to continually expand their abilities as I do!

~I also love to dance! ~

lenders.name: Jean

lenders.name: Elmira College WMS
lenders.loan_because: Our senior seminar in Feminist Studies studied issues faced by women all over the world.  We decided to fund raise to give micro-loans to women as part of our celebration of International Women's Day.
